changelog:
* Trezor Safe 3 now supports Solana, expanding the range of cryptocurrencies it can securely manage. [Universal fw only] 
* Ethereum fees are now uniformly presented in Gwei, enhancing clarity and consistency for users. [Universal fw only] 
* Issue with missing address confirmation screens is now fixed. [Universal fw only] 
* Resolved an issue related to the invalid encoding of signatures from the Optiga chip.
